original_title: Sandra De Zoysa wins Lifetime Achievement Award at Women in IT Awards (Asia Edition)
original_body_lines: Sandra De Zoysa, Chief Customer Officer of Dialog Axiata Sri Lanka, has been honored with the prestigious Lifetime Achievement Award of the Year 2023 at the Women in IT Awards (Asia Edition).
This recognition highlights her exceptional contributions to the field of information technology and her remarkable leadership in the industry.

The Women in IT Awards (Asia Edition) is a highly esteemed platform that acknowledges and celebrates the achievements of women in the IT sector across the Asian region. Winning this Lifetime Achievement Award is a testament to Sandra's outstanding career, dedication, and profound impact on the industry.

Throughout her tenure as the Chief Customer Officer of Dialog Axiata Sri Lanka, Sandra De Zoysa has demonstrated exemplary leadership, innovation, and a customer-centric approach. Under her guidance, Dialog Axiata Sri Lanka has emerged as a trailblazer in the telecommunications industry, providing cutting-edge technological solutions and revolutionizing customer experiences.

Sandra's unwavering commitment to empowering women in the IT sector has been commendable. She has actively fostered an inclusive work environment within Dialog Axiata Sri Lanka, promoting diversity and encouraging women to excel in their careers. Her efforts have paved the way for gender equality and challenged traditional norms in the male-dominated IT industry.

Receiving the Lifetime Achievement Award at the Women in IT Awards (Asia Edition) is a well-deserved recognition of Sandra De Zoysa's exceptional leadership, innovation, and dedication. Her accomplishments serve as an inspiration to aspiring women in technology, proving that with determination and passion, they can achieve extraordinary success.
